item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

There was an error in the runserver, and the server crashed, I think it had something to do with playerhandler process.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:38)

PlayerHandler.java:173:

[code] while(players[i].process());[code]

and thats part of

[code] for(int i = 0; i < maxPlayers; i++) {
if(players[i] == null || !players[i].isActive) continue;

		players[i].actionAmount--;

		players[i].preProcessing();
		while(players[i].process());
		players[i].postProcessing();

		players[i].getNextPlayerMovement();[/code]

server.java:38:

			playerHandler.process();

and thats part of:

int waitFails = 0; long lastTicks = System.currentTimeMillis(); long totalTimeSpentProcessing = 0; int cycle = 0; while(!shutdownServer) { playerHandler.process(); npcHandler.process(); shopHandler.process(); itemHandler.process();

Any ideas whats wrong?[/code][/code]

Read full topic
